sp_widget.name: Material Home
sp_widget.template:
<md-input-container> <label>Select a category</label> <md-select ng-model="selectedCategory"> <md-option ng-repeat="cat in categories" ng-value="cat"> {{cat.label}} </md-option> </md-select> </md-input-container>
<md-input-container class="md-block" md-no-float> <input ng-model="searchText" placeholder="{{selectedCategory.label}}"> </md-input-container>
<md-button class="md-raised md-primary" ng-disabled="!searchText">Add criteria</md-button>
<md-button class="md-raised md-primary">Search</md-button>
